COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128
STRING: I saw Torta out of the cafeteria and remained there so I
could speak with Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e
STRING: Asino had lessons with Ms. Cordell as well, and took
her classes straight after me, after the lunch break.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154
STRING: I decided to kill some time in the cafeteria and then
head to the classrooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190
STRING: It was about five minutes before the third period lessons
ended, and there was no one in the hallways.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6
STRING: I stood in front of the room I had just had a lesson in,
and killed a little time again looking at the music I
wrote.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206
STRING: I heard Asino's voice, then closed the music and raised
my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: [Asino] “Hi, Chris. What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244
STRING: [Chris] “Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276
STRING: [Asino] “This is rare. But, you weren't waiting for me,
were you? Ms. Cordell is still inside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x296
STRING: [Chris] “No, I was waiting for you, Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8
STRING: [Asino] “That... That really is rare.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: Other than Torta, Asino was my only good friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: Even so, we weren't together all the time, and I didn't
feel like we needed to be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30a
STRING: I could see him any time I needed to, but I sometimes
didn't see him for over a week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x320
STRING: Of course if we just happened to meet, we'd go for a
meal together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336
STRING: But today wasn't a chance meeting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x342
STRING: [Chris] “I wanted to ask you a favor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360
STRING: [Asino] “Me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: Okay... If this is going to take a while,
we should go somewhere quieter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4
STRING: [Chris] “Let's walk and talk in that case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ce
STRING: Asino replied with his usual twitch-of-the-lips grin, and
started walking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fc
STRING: [Cordell] “Hello?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x444
STRING: [Asino] “Ah, Professor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45a
STRING: [Chris] “Afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x470
STRING: Ms. Cordell leaned on the open door and looked at us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48e
STRING: [Cordell] “Are you going to discuss the matter of your
partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: [Chris] “That's the plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d6
STRING: [Asino] “Oh, you haven't found one either, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ec
STRING: [Chris] “Wait, you mean...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, it appears you both have yet to find
partners.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x534
STRING: The professor said this evenly, neither angry nor
sympathetic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: [Asino] “Well, I have a candidate, more or less. Don't
lump me in with him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x590
STRING: [Chris] “You're not the only one with a candidate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c2
STRING: [Asino] “Tortinita, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d8
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong with that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: [Asino] “Nothing, of course...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x628
STRING: [Cordell] “If you ask me, you're both in the same boat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: [Asino] “That's... That's true, but.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x670
STRING: [Chris] “I know. That's why I wanted to talk to Asino...
But I guess there's no point if he's in the same situation.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: [Asino] “How do you know if you haven't even tried?.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e8
STRING: [Cordell] “Just work up the will to find someone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x710
STRING: [Asino] “You're saying that to Chris only, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72e
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, in your case Asino, I haven't even heard
your candidate's name.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74c
STRING: [Asino] “I'll tell you when I decide.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77e
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes, I know. That's why I'm not worried about
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: [Chris] “But you're worried about me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c8
STRING: With a rare smile, the professor nodded lightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fa
STRING: [Asino] “Must be nice, people having your back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x810
STRING: [Chris] “Shut up...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x842
STRING: [Cordell] “Regardless!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x858
STRING: When I glared at Asino for being sarcastic, the professor
raised her voice in reproach.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x876
STRING: [Cordell] “Doing anything is better than nothing. It also
serves as an excuse.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x896
STRING: [Chris] “To you, Professor?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c8
STRING: [Cordell] “Even to yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f6
STRING: Ms. Cordell smiled lightly in salutation and walked back
to the teachers' room to prepare for her next lesson.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91e
STRING: [Asino] “Anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: Asino used the opportunity to segue back to the
original subject.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x952
STRING: [Asino] “I'm worried about you, too, so I'll help you out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah... Much obliged.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: After what Ms. Cordell said to me, I couldn't very well
refuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99e
STRING: I was already planning to ask for his help anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9aa
STRING: I nodded to show my gratitude, and decided to let
Asino choose what to do next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: [Asino] “Well, let's get out of here in any case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, but, where to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f2
STRING: [Asino] “Somewhere suitable, maybe the Cenacolo.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa08
STRING: [Chris] “Can't get more suitable than that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa26
STRING: [Asino] “And that's why I suggested it. See how this
works?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: Asino said this definitively, and started walking toward
the Second Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: When I went there last time, I'd been made painfully
aware that it would probably be impossible to find a
partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa2
STRING: I was able to meet Miss Fal, however, so I couldn't say
it was a complete failure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab8
STRING: Also, being with Asino, who was so good with people,
would make things different, right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xace
STRING: [Chris] “Well... Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae4
STRING: I mumbled this to myself and followed him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf6
STRING: [Chris] “I guess that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0c
STRING: I mumbled this reply to myself and followed him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb98
STRING: In the room were a few students who seemed to be
third years like myself, playing something improvised.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbae
STRING: First and second-years would still be in class at this
time, so I probably wasn't wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc4
STRING: They must have noticed someone enter, as they
stopped playing right away and one of them called out
to Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “Oh, Asino. What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc08
STRING: [Asino] “Not much. Anyway, are you a voice student?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc26
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “What are you talking about? I'm a piano
student! How could you forget?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4e
STRING: [Asino] “I thought your voice was as beautiful as you
are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc64
STRING: She probably didn't take the joke seriously, but she
smiled and forgave the mistake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7a
STRING: As Asino carried on going over to speak to more
people, I remained leaning against the wall, just
watching him intently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: At some point he said that although he was registered
as a Fortelle student, he really wanted to be a lyricist.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca6
STRING: That may have been why Asino was able to use sweet
talk so shamelessly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcbc
STRING: And people seemed to like it, so you could call it talent,
I suppose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcda
STRING: [Asino] “Do you think a lot of voice students will come
today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “Yeah, my friends said they'd come by later.
What? Don't you have a partner yet, Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd20
STRING: [Asino] “Unfortunately, no. But we're not looking for my
partner today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd66
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah well, in that case, I think we'll wait until
they show up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: Asino waved goodbye to the girl, then walked over to
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: [Asino] “Hey, Chris. Do you want to do this or what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: [Chris] “Not really...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdec
STRING: [Asino] “What are we here for, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: [Chris] “To look for a partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe34
STRING: [Asino] “Fine... Nothing gets started until the voice
students get here anyway. I'll just be killing time,
alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5e
STRING: [Chris] “I'll be hanging around, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7c
STRING: [Asino] “Gotcha. If someone that fits the bill shows up,
you talk to them, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: [Chris] “Will do... for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee4
STRING: I put my back up against the wall and surveyed the
room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef0
STRING: More people came as time passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: The Cenacolo was really living up to its role as a venue
to promote student interaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1a
STRING: [Asino] “Oh wow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf30
STRING: And of course I could hear Asino's voice from far away
talking happily to a female student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf46
STRING: He talked in a very friendly way, but had said that he
hardly remembered any of the girls' names.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5c
STRING: I didn't know if that was impressive or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: As for myself, I wasn't good at talking to new people,
and even worse when they talked to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf88
STRING: People must get that sense from me, as no one had
approached me yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa6
STRING: [Asino] “Chris. Being a wallflower doesn't suit you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe6
STRING: He said the same words that he said to me a long time
ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff2
STRING: I thought it nostalgic, but also found the timing of it
puzzling, not to mention annoying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: [Chris] “Why don't you go use that line on the girls?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: [Asino] “No, I'm bored with that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103c
STRING: [Chris] “Which is why you're now speaking to a guy, is
that it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105a
STRING: [Asino] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1070
STRING: Asino said this, evidently joking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107c
STRING: Then his face turned serious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: [Asino] “What is it that you want to do today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: [Chris] “You brought me here... But this kind of place
doesn't suit me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f6
STRING: [Asino] “I guess that's true... Do you want to go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: [Chris] “What, we're going to leave? Just like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112a
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, well. Let's go outside for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Chris] “Got it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1178
STRING: We shut the door and Asino started talking as we
walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a0
STRING: [Asino] “You're wondering why I suggested leaving so
abruptly?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b6
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. You looked like you were having fun, so I
felt kind of bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d4
STRING: [Asino] “I didn't come here today for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ea
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1208
STRING: [Asino] “No, don't be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121e
STRING: [Chris] “But I wasn't even looking very seriously.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1250
STRING: [Asino] “You looked a little, didn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1266
STRING: [Chris] “A little...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127c
STRING: By “a little,” I meant that I looked at the faces of
students passing by, and decided in my head they'd be
no good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ae
STRING: [Asino] “Right? There wasn't anyone there good for you,
anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Chris] “Good for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ec
STRING: [Asino] “In a lot of ways. Personally and musically.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah, I thought so, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: We strolled around the campus together, but in the end
it came to nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: We stopped just outside the campus.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135c
STRING: Asino walked brazenly through the misty rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1372
STRING: I found myself frowning in the rain, when Asino turned
around in his usual manner and called over to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a4
STRING: [Asino] “Hurry up. Not like this is the first time you've
seen rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ba
STRING: [Chris] “I know. I just don't really like getting wet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e2
STRING: [Asino] “You say that, but you stick out like a sore
thumb using an umbrella.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1402
STRING: [Chris] “I know. But that's just because the people here
think it's uncool. If you ask me, they're out of their
minds.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142a
STRING: [Asino] “You're such a kid...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1440
STRING: [Chris] “You're right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1456
STRING: I ran to catch up with Asino, who resumed talking about
the original subject.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1488
STRING: [Asino] “You can just pair up with Tortinita if it comes to
that. Let's just call it off for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14be
STRING: I couldn't get very excited about that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: Then again, I wasn't really looking forward to whoever
Ms. Cordell would bring.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14fc
STRING: [Asino] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1512
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1528
STRING: The conversation had tapered off, and Asino let out a
sigh of resignation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x155a
STRING: [Asino] “Oh... I'm a little tired is all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1570
STRING: [Chris] “Oh. Sorry about today, bringing you along on
this pointless exercise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ac
STRING: [Asino] “I said you don't need to be sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c2
STRING: [Chris] “You said they didn't suit me before, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f4
STRING: [Asino] “Are we talking about girls?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. But... They don't really suit you, either, do
they Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1646
STRING: [Asino] “How so...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x165c
STRING: [Chris] “You don't even remember the girls' names. Isn't
that why you're tired?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: [Asino] “No, everyone has fun.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169a
STRING: [Chris] “Does everyone include you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16cc
STRING: [Asino] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fe
STRING: [Asino] “Are you jealous?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: [Chris] “What...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1732
STRING: [Asino] “Of the girls.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1748
STRING: [Chris] “I don't know why you came to that conclusion...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: [Asino] “You're cute, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: A pat on the head followed this odd remark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179c
STRING: [Chris] “Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ba
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah-yeah. Should we head home?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d0
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going home... Not because you said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e6
STRING: I retorted and slapped the hand on my head away, but
Asino's strange smile didn't falter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180e
STRING: [Asino] “Okay, let's walk together as far as the main
road.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1876
STRING: In the end, Asino ignored my continued protests and
remained in a good mood.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a8
STRING: [Asino] “Right, Chris. If you don't have any plans, how
about we have dinner together?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c8
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? I don't have any plans... Okay, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18de
STRING: I always made my own dinner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ea
STRING: I didn't have a part-time job, so all I had to live on was
the allowance that my parents sent me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1900
STRING: As for my tuition, Fortelle students received grants from
the government, so it wasn't expensive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1916
STRING: So I was able to live a pretty easy life without putting
too much strain on my parents.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192c
STRING: But the fact remained I was still burdening my parents
to some extent, so I made sure I didn't waste money.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: [Chris] “Where do you want to go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1958
STRING: Asino lived in the city with his family, so he had no
problem spending extravagantly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196e
STRING: I always turned him down when it was a place I couldn't
afford.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197a
STRING: But Asino knew that, so he usually didn't invite me to
eat at those kinds of places.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1998
STRING: [Asino] “I found a nice trattoria recently. And of course
it's affordable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b8
STRING: [Chris] “I see... That'll be fine. I haven't had a meal with
anyone in a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d8
STRING: A trattoria was like a cafeteria and wasn't too luxurious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ee
STRING: I could easily eat out like this about once a month. My
parents even told me to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0c
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah. It's in the Old District, so it's close to your
place, Chris. You may even know it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2c
STRING: [Chris] “No, I didn't know there was a trattoria close to
my apartment. I don't eat out much, and when I do it's
mostly with you, Asino. But... the Old District?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a72
STRING: [Asino] “Hmm? Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a88
STRING: [Chris] “It's just unusual. You almost always take me
somewhere in the New District, or some place on the
main road.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac4
STRING: [Asino] “A friend took me there. I really liked it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0e
STRING: The sign on the shop Asino brought me to said
”Copert.” It looked like quite a stylish place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b24
STRING: [Chris] “Wow, how uncharacteristically tasteful for you,
Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b56
STRING: [Asino] “You're one to talk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b96
STRING: Inside it was crowded, it being right at dinner time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bac
STRING: Asino must have come here many times. He called out
cheerfully to one of the girls and they talked happily as
she showed us to a table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be8
STRING: [Asino] “What will you have, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfe
STRING: [Chris] “Anything, just whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c1c
STRING: [Asino] “You always say that. So I guess you don't need
to hear the specials.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c3c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah. I'll have pasta. Peperoncini to make
it easy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c64
STRING: [Asino] “Ordering like you're a regular. Fine, I'll have the
same. I've had all the others.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c84
STRING: A simple pasta made with just peppers, garlic, and olive
oil. But it is said that you could tell how good a
restaurant is by their Peperoncini.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca4
STRING: That wasn't my intention, of course; I just ordered it
because I liked it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cba
STRING: But Asino knew this and shrugged his shoulders
teasingly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cec
STRING: [Asino] “So, about your partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d02
STRING: Asino talked while eating the food that had been
brought out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d18
STRING: The flavor was so great that even Asino liked it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2c
STRING: [Asino] “So it's not Tortinita?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d42
STRING: [Chris] “God... Why does everyone want to put me with
Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d7e
STRING: [Asino] “Because that would be natural.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d94
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose it would be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc6
STRING: [Asino] “Also, it's bad for me if you don't pair up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ddc
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Why is it bad for you, Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0e
STRING: [Asino] “Tortinita's been on my case. She wants me to
help her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2e
STRING: [Chris] “You're... You're lying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4c
STRING: [Asino] “She hasn't actually said it. I can tell, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e62
STRING: [Chris] “That's just what you think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e94
STRING: [Asino] “Well, that's beside the point.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eaa
STRING: [Chris] “Enough...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec8
STRING: [Asino] “What's the reason?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ede
STRING: [Chris] “The reason why I won't pair up with Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efc
STRING: [Asino] “I can't figure it out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f12
STRING: [Chris] “Are you worried as a friend? Or...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f30
STRING: [Asino] “It's just common curiosity, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f46
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Thanks, I guess. If you must know, it's
about Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f64
STRING: [Asino] “Arietta, huh? I've never met her so I don't know,
but I think Tortinita suits you better.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8e
STRING: [Chris] “You wouldn't understand, Asino. Torta's fine, but
Arie...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fca
STRING: [Asino] “She's not... Not okay?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff8
STRING: Well, it's your problem,
so you deal with it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200e
STRING: [Chris] “Well of course I will! It wasn't me that brought
this topic up!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204a
STRING: [Asino] “I worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2060
STRING: [Chris] “Shouldn't you worry about yourself first?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2092
STRING: [Asino] “Of course. Who said I was worrying about you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20a8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah, thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20d2
STRING: I was used to Asino talking like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20de
STRING: He was truly worried about me, so he passed it off by
saying it was common curiosity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f4
STRING: If he was really asking from curiosity, he was really
good at acting seriously worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2114
STRING: In the end, that must have been all he wanted to talk
about. After that, we just chatted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2144
STRING: After we finished eating, we left the restaurant and
parted ways.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2176
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2194
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, welcome home. You're late again today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b4
STRING: [Chris] “I ate out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e6
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21fc
STRING: The restaurant Asino took me to was good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2212
STRING: But I thought something was strange about Asino's
attitude.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x221e
STRING: I wondered why he was so worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: [Phorni] “Were you with Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2248
STRING: [Chris] “Yep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2284
STRING: I explained the day's happenings simply to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2290
STRING: That he called me cute, and that he was strangely
worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a6
STRING: [Chris] “And that's all. I don't really know what it was
about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d8
STRING: [Phorni] “Wow, is this the same Asino...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22fc
STRING: She talked about him in a familiar manner, but Phorni
had never met Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2312
STRING: He'd come to the house to pick me up a few times, but
he had never come inside to talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2328
STRING: I'd never been to Asino's house, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2334
STRING: But we talked when we saw each other, sometimes
going somewhere on our days off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234a
STRING: Thinking about it, our relationship was pretty unique,
but he was still my friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2360
STRING: Regardless, anything Phorni knew about Asino was
based on what I told her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2376
STRING: To her, Asino was a slightly irresponsible and
pretentious poet, who also happened to be popular
with girls.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238c
STRING: Since Phorni never talked to anyone except me, creating
a her own image of people through second-hand
information was really the only way she could socialize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ac
STRING: But her instincts were pretty good. She was almost
never wrong about people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c2
STRING: [Chris] “Isn't it weird?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d8
STRING: Of course, I'd known Asino for quite a while and knew
that he wasn't such a simple person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ee
STRING: He was skilled at using words, so I didn't think the
things he said were totally off the cuff.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: But I did suspect there was an ulterior motive in there
somewhere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2436
STRING: [Phorni] “But I kind of understand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244c
STRING: [Chris] “You understand?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2494
STRING: Phorni waved her little hands cutely to get me to listen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24aa
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d6
STRING: [Phorni] “You are cute, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ec
STRING: The moment my face got close to Phorni, her hand
touched my hair and I realized she was petting me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2502
STRING: [Chris] “Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2520
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah-ha-ha.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2536
STRING: Phorni just laughed, and continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2542
STRING: Her arms were so small that even when she touched me
with her entire hand, it was like being poked by a single
finger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2558
STRING: It tickled a little and I wanted to lift my head, but I soon
thought better of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256e
STRING: I had an irrational concern that Phorni's hand might get
caught in my hair, and she would fall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258e
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni... I'm gonna lift my head, so take your
hand off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ac
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh? What to do...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c2
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not asking, I'm telling you to stop.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e0
STRING: [Phorni] “You can be so selfish sometimes, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x260a
STRING: [Chris] “Who's selfish...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x263c
STRING: [Phorni] “What? Didn't you hear me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2652
STRING: [Chris] “Enough...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2684
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah-ha-ha, don't sulk. So? What else happened?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a4
STRING: We both knew I wasn't really angry, so Phorni kept
teasing me with a huge smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26cc
STRING: Telling Phorni what happened during the day like this
was already a daily routine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e2
STRING: She didn't want to go outside, but always wanted to
hear me talk about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fa
STRING: Fairies are mysterious creatures; even after living with
one for almost three years, I didn't fully understand
them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2710
STRING: She could touch things, but didn't get wet in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x271c
STRING: She didn't eat anything, and could sing and sing without
getting tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2732
STRING: She floated, but couldn't fly, and she could appear and
disappear at will.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2748
STRING: Despite defying the laws of physics, she couldn't get up
high and was always bugging me for a hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2760
STRING: But... Leaving a towel by the door after I left in the
morning became Phorni's job at some point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2776
STRING: In short, it was impossible to think about Phorni
logically. If you could accept her for what she was, it
was quite fun.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2796
STRING: In ancient times written about in history books, people
lost a part of their civilization called “magic.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ac
STRING: It was replaced at some point by a field called “science,”
which made a fair amount of progress over many long
years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c2
STRING: But there were still many things not understood in the
world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d8
STRING: One of those things was a cheerful fairy, skilled at
singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f0
STRING: Thinking about the unknown boundaries of the world
was a boundless and ultimately futile exercise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fc
STRING: That's what I had come to think these days.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2826
STRING: Then, I told Phorni about my day, as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2870
STRING: And so this day, too, announced its end with no real
result to show for it.
